1 /* University of Genoa - Software Architecture for Robotics (2017/2018) */
2 /* Project: Teleoperation with MIRO - Mateus Sanches Moura, Suman Ghosh */
3 /* Monte Carlo Simulation service source code */
4 
5 /* Libraries */
6 #include "ros/ros.h"
7 #include "miro_teleop/MonteCarlo.h"
8 #include <cstdio>
9 #include <cmath>
10 #include <map>
11 #include <boost/random.hpp>
12 #include <boost/random/normal_distribution.hpp>
13 #include <boost/random/uniform_real_distribution.hpp>
14 
15 /* Constants */
16 #define H_SIZE 400 // Horizontal map size (in cm)
17 #define V_SIZE 400 // Vertical map size (in cm)
18 #define NZ 5 // Number of zones
19 #define RES 40 // Grid resolution
20 #define PERT_THRESH 0.5
21 
22 //Method to quantize coordinate of a point to index of discretized matrix, along a particular dimension
23 int quantize(float x, float xmin, float xmax, float quantum){
24  int n = ceil((xmax-xmin)/quantum);
25  int posOrigin = ceil(n/2.0)-1;
26  float delta = 0;
27  if (n%2 != 0)
28  delta = quantum/2.0;
29  int index = posOrigin + ceil((x-delta)/quantum);
30  return index;
31 }
32 
33 /* Service function */
34 bool MCSimulation(miro_teleop::MonteCarlo::Request &req,
35  miro_teleop::MonteCarlo::Response &res)
36  {
37  int iters = 10000, batch = 1, max_x, max_y;
38  float quantum = 10.0, sdx = 30, sdy = 30, rx, ry, xmin=-200, xmax=200, ymin=-200, ymax=200;
39  float max_obj = 0, obj;
40 
41  //Obtain input request data
42  std_msgs::Float64 landscape[RES*RES];
43  for(int i=0;i<req.landscape.size();i++)
44  landscape[i].data = req.landscape[i].data;
45 
46  //For c++11
47  // random_device rd;
48  // mt19937 e2(rd());
49  // normal_distribution<> distx(Px, sdx);
50  // normal_distribution<> disty(Py, sdy);
51 
52  //For boost with c++98
53  boost::mt19937 *rng = new boost::mt19937();
54  rng->seed(time(NULL));
55 
56  //Normal Distribution
57  //boost::normal_distribution<> distx(req.P.x, sdx);
58  //boost::normal_distribution<> disty(req.P.y, sdy);
59  // boost::variate_generator< boost::mt19937, boost::normal_distribution<> > dx(*rng, distx);
60  // boost::variate_generator< boost::mt19937, boost::normal_distribution<> > dy(*rng, disty);
61 
62  //Uniform Distribution
63  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> distx(xmin, xmax);
64  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> disty(ymin, ymax);
65  boost::variate_generator< boost::mt19937, boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> > dx(*rng, distx);
66  boost::variate_generator< boost::mt19937, boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> > dy(*rng, disty);
67 
68  //For c++98
69  //std::srand(std::time(NULL));
70  //float e2 =std::rand();
71  while(max_obj<PERT_THRESH){
72  for (int i = 1; i <= iters; i++) {
73  rx=dx();
74  ry=dy();
75  std::cout<<"Random point generated at ("<<rx<<","<<ry<<") ";
76  //Excluding points on and outside the boundary
77  if(rx>xmin && rx<xmax && ry>ymin && ry<ymax){
78  int ncols = ceil((xmax-xmin)/quantum);
79  int nrows = ceil((ymax-ymin)/quantum);
80  int index_x = quantize(rx, xmin, xmax, quantum);
81  int index_y = (ncols-1-quantize(ry, ymin, ymax, quantum)); //Inverting to maintain mapping consistency with matrix formed by pertinence mapper
82 
83  obj = landscape[index_y*ncols + index_x].data;
84  std::cout<<"val = "<<obj<<std::endl;
85  if(obj>max_obj) {
86  max_obj=obj;
87  max_x=rx;
88  max_y=ry;
89  }
90  }
91  }
92  }
93 
94  res.goal.x = max_x;
95  res.goal.y = max_y;
96  ROS_INFO("Goal position: (%f,%f,%f)",
97  res.goal.x, res.goal.y, res.goal.theta);
98  return true;
99  }
100 
101  /* Main function */
102  int main(int argc, char **argv)
103  {
104  /* Initialize, assign a node handler and advertise service */
105  ros::init(argc, argv, "monte_carlo_server");
106  ros::NodeHandle n;
107  ros::ServiceServer service =
108  n.advertiseService("monte_carlo", MCSimulation);
109  ROS_INFO("Monte Carlo Simulation service active");
110  ros::spin();
111 
112  return 0;
113  }
